basics.name: Suk Wen Ruan
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Marketing and Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Collaborated with diverse clients to implement social media promotions, content calendars, and other marketing materials using copywriting, media relations, and design.
highlights: Established content for clients to build a highly engaged social following across various social media platforms
Networked with a team to deliver efficient and satisfactory services when hosting media events and promotions

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to first-time degree-seeking students who maintain a 3.8 GPA.
